* Even if I propose a better split, my share would be worth significantly less due to 40% inflation

Given that any future rounds will significantly reduce the value of my share due to compounding inflation, and Bob's current offer still gives me a meaningful amount ($240,000 in effective value), I should accept this offer rather than risk getting even less in future rounds.
